summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%) and rainfall (up 1.7 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11509 lux) and cloud levels (up 236 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15761 lux), the amount of wind (up 20 miles), cloud levels (up 559 m), and rainfall (down 1.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 236.4m lower than yesterday, 494.1m lower than past week, 559.3m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 269m to a maximum of 930m, averaging 307.1m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 801.2m and 866.4m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, humidity should not be a concern and gentle light winds are expected. Moderate rainfall, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and light levels will be low during the day. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
